actions.name: Numb Cruelty

cost.trigger: The user declares a Psychic- or Ice-Type Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Psychic- or Ice-Type Attack.

Effect: On hit, all valid targets have a 20% chance of gaining @Affliction[fear] 7.

actions.name: Numb Cruelty (Afflicted)

cost.trigger: The user targets a creature that is afflicted with @Affliction[fear] with an Attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user targets a creature that is afflicted with @Affliction[splinter] with an Attack.

Effect: On hit, the target has a 30% chance of losing -1 DEF and SPDEF Stages for 7 Activations.
